title: Project Overview/Xfinite
content: Xfinite is a building labeling project where workers label roofs and building shapes in satellite maps. Work is flexible and paid per qualified output.

title: Getting Started
content: Attend Live Sessions, complete 22 Hands-on Training tasks, join Orientation, then start working on projects.

title: Requirements
content: Internet connection (DSL/Fiber/VPN/HTTP Injector/LTE Pocket Wifi or Modem), unlimited data, PC or laptop with mouse, good moral character, analytical skills for building/house shapes. Minimum system: Quad Core, 8GB RAM, Windows 7/10/11.

title: Work Hours
content: 2-8 hours a day or 10-20 days a month. Must complete 40 hours per month cycle. Hours are flexible.

title: Rates and Pay
content: Base rate is $2 per 800 qualified features. Experienced labelers earn up to $3-$6+ per hour. Payout is every 4 weeks. Salary payment modes are detailed in training.

title: Charges
content: Service fee 4%, Management fee P115 ($2), Admin fee 12%.

title: Review Process
content: Work is reviewed by Checkers then approved by Judgers.

title: Training Overview
content: Training takes 2 days and includes: Pre-course Exam, Live Training Module, Rules and Guidelines, Land Cover Training, and Actual Live Labeling with Pay.

title: Installation Steps
content: Go to User Profile. Click Show Password. Get your Ginger ID and Password and save them in a Notepad.

title: Software Installation
content: Install 7-zip. Extract Visual-C-Runtimes-All-in-One.zip. Open the folder and run Install_all.bat until finished.

title: Training Videos
content: Watch all training videos: Basic Labeling (Basics, Techniques, Switching, Task Overview), 3D and Multilayer Guide (Basic 3D, Drawing Lines, Overview).

title: Login Steps
content: Open ginger-2018.exe, enter Ginger ID and Password, update if prompted, restart, press Arrow Down or Download icon to start tasks.

title: Verification
content: After Hands-on Training, fill out the Verification Form. Wait for Cedrick Sabrine to verify your account to access the Rules and Guidelines.

title: Troubleshooting
content: If Bitmappro does not open, wait for registration. If invalid Ginger ID, check spaces and copy from Bitmappro. For install errors: redownload, move to Drive C, disable antivirus, restart WiFi, update Windows.

title: Community and Social Media
content: Join XF Trainees Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/xftraining. You can also join the community chat. Subscribe to the YouTube channel for more guides.

title: Application Process
content: How to apply: 1. Like the Facebook Page. 2. Share the opportunity. 3. Join the XF Training Facebook group (https://www.facebook.com/groups/xftraining). 4. Subscribe to the YouTube channel. 5. Take the Pre-course Exam.

title: Contact Information
content: For inquiries, join the XF Trainees Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/xftraining. You can also reach out to the management team: Cedrick Sabrine, Ey Dacanay, or Joni Baldon.
